item.title: Dani add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "And above all, watch with glittering eyes the whole world around you because the greatest secrets are always hidden in the most unlikely places. Those who don't believe in magic will never find it." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Dani add a quote by Harold Kushner
item.description: "I think of life as a good book. The further you get into it, the more it begins to make sense." -- Harold Kushner

item.title: Dani add a quote by thomas kempis
item.description: "A book has but one voice, but it does not instruct everyone alike." -- thomas kempis

item.title: Dani add a quote by Marsha Norman
item.description: "Dreams are illustrations...from the book your soul is writing about you." -- Marsha Norman

item.title: Dani add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Those who find ugly meanings in beautiful things are corrupt without being charming. This is a fault. Those who find beautiful meanings in beautiful things are the cultivated. For these there is hope. They are the elect to whom beautiful things mean only Beauty. There is no such thing as a moral or an immoral book. Books are well written, or badly written. That is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Dani add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde
